content: 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet round 13 chain 1 single_crochet 240 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet stitch count 240 single_crochet round 14 chain 1 work a double_crochet into each single_crochet of round 12 working over and enclosing round 13 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st double_crochet stitch count 240 double_crochet round 15 chain 1 single_crochet 240 join with a slip_stitch into your 1st single_crochet fasten_off and secure your ends stitch count 240 single_crochet now rotate your work so that the starting chain is at the top with the right side facing up join your yarn to the 1st chain st where you placed your stitch marker note that this repeat of round 4 will be worked over both the starting chain and the scs of round 1 enclosing them repeat rounds 4 15 on this side fasten_off and secure your ends 3
